snippet: The Israeli ambassador to the U.N. and a reader discuss an Op-Ed article by Secretary General Ban Ki-moon.
abstract: Letter from Danny Danon, Israeli envoy to United Nations, responds to Feb 1 Op-Ed by UN Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon arguing policy changes and political compromise must accompany security measures in any settlement of Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
lead_paragraph: The Israeli ambassador to the U.N. and a reader discuss an Op-Ed article by Secretary General Ban Ki-moon.

headline.print_headline: Israel and the U.N. Chief: A Clash of Perspectives
headline.main: Israel and the U.N. Chief: A Clash of Perspectives
